column2: Apple loses patent retrial to VirnetX
column4: Sept. 30 A federal jury in Texas on Friday night ordered Apple Inc to pay more than $302 million in damages for using VirnetX Holding Corp's patented internet security technology without permission in features including its FaceTime video conferencing application. ~

column2: Morphosys moves closer to getting first antibody drug on market FRANKFURT
column3: Oct 1 German biotech Morphosys  moved a step closer to getting its first antibody drug onto the market as its licensee
